landingPage.announcement_text: KOREAN CLINIC-GRADE FORMULA | The Same Regeneration Cocktail Used in $500 Facials
landingPage.hero_product_name: Korean PDRN + GHK-Cu + Goji Exosomes Triple Regeneration Micro-Infusion Kit
hero_benefits: Instantly reduces crow's feet, smile lines & forehead wrinkles
30x absorption - delivers actives deep into skin
landingPage.tech_subheadline: Professional-grade ingredients delivered deep into your skin with micro-infusion technology
landingPage.ingredients_subheadline: The 2024-2025 "Regeneration Cocktail" trending in Korean luxury clinics

ingredients.name: PDRN 3%
benefits: Activates cell repair at molecular level

ingredients.name: GHK-Cu Copper Tripeptide
ingredients.badge: üí° Blue serum = Proof of authentic concentration
benefits: Evens skin tone & fades dark spots

testimonials.text: My skin is noticeably firmer, fine lines less visible

testimonials.name: Christy T.
testimonials.text: Visible improvement in 3 months. Friends keep asking what I did

testimonials.name: Annie P.

testimonials.text: After 6 weeks, the fine lines around my eyes visibly reduced. My skin feels so much firmer.

landing_faqs.answer: Salmon DNA-derived regeneration factor that activates cell repair and boosts collagen production. It's the #1 ingredient in Korean 'baby skin' facials.
landing_faqs.question: What is PDRN?

landing_faqs.answer: Hydration and glow from first use. Visible firming and wrinkle reduction in 4-6 weeks. Dramatic transformation by week 8-12.
landing_faqs.question: When will I see results?

landing_faqs.answer: Mild tingling that fades in seconds. Safe and painless. Much gentler than professional microneedling.
landing_faqs.question: Does it hurt?

landing_faqs.answer: The blue color comes from Copper Tripeptide-1 (GHK-Cu). This is proof of authentic, properly concentrated copper peptide. Beware of colorless 'copper peptide' products.
landing_faqs.question: Why is the serum blue?

landing_faqs.answer: Yes! All three ingredients have anti-inflammatory properties. This formula is excellent for sensitive, rosacea-prone, or post-procedure skin.
landing_faqs.question: Suitable for sensitive skin?

landing_faqs.answer: Every two weeks for best results. Each session takes only 5 minutes.
landing_faqs.question: How often should I use it?

landingPage.footer_disclaimer: Our products are not intended to diagnose, cure, or prevent specific diseases or medical conditions.

pain_points.description: Topical creams and serums can only reach the skin‚Äôs surface ‚Äî limiting effectiveness. Professional clinic treatments can address deeper layers, but are expensive, time-consuming, and often require recovery time. Our Micro-Infusion System bridges the gap by allowing advanced actives to be delivered more effectively than traditional skincare, without needles, surgery, or clinic visits.

landingPage.hero_static_content: Our Micro-Infusion System combines precision delivery and advanced bioactives traditionally found in clinical settings, now accessible for safe, at-home use. Using ultra-fine titanium 0.5 mm microneedles, this system creates microscopic channels in the skin‚Äôs surface to enhance the delivery of a powerful serum blend ‚Äî including Sodium DNA, Goji Stem-Cell Exosomes, Copper Tripeptide, and Oligo-HA ‚Äî rebuild smoother, firmer, more radiant skin with minimal discomfort and no downtime.
